mapper.select: select lecture_subject_no lectureSubjectNo, subject_name subjectName, lecture_name lectureName FROM lecture_subject WHERE lecture_name=#{lectureName}

SELECT subject_name subjectName, lecture_name lectureName, lecture_subject_no lectureSubjectNo FROM lecture_subject WHERE lecture_name = (SELECT e.lecture_name lectureName FROM student s INNER JOIN education e USING(account_id) WHERE s.account_id=#{accountId} )
